column4: I'm setting up dual boot of 9.10 on Vista machine.......if i set up partition of 25 GB and the rest says FREE SPACE, is it going to format the entire hard drive and delete the existing windows data?
do you know what is on your partitions otherwise?
are you confident that the 25gb partition is one that you know the contents of?
i'm trying to set up the partition, currently there is only 1 partition for the vista installation
